trans-unit.source: Describes the contract that a particular <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export"></xref> object satisfies.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> class.

Derived types that call this constructor must override the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition.ContractName%2A> property and optionally, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition.Metadata%2A> property.
By default, <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition.Metadata%2A> returns an empty, read-only dictionary.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> class with the specified contract name and metadata.
The contract name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> object.

The metadata of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> or `null` to set the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition.Metadata"></xref> property to an empty, read-only <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2"></xref> object.
contractName is `null`.
contractName is an empty string ("").
Gets the contract name.
Overrides of this property should never return `null` or an empty string ("").
The contract name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref> object.
The property was not overridden by a derived class.
Gets the contract metadata.

Overrides of this property should return a read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object with a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparer, such as <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>, and should never return `null`.
If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition> does not contain metadata, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> instead.
The metadata of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition"></xref>.
The default is an empty, read-only <xref href="System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2"></xref> object.
Returns a string representation of the export definition.
A string representation of the export definition.
